extension.searchTitle: JAMES ZADROGA 9/11 HEALTH AND COMPENSATION ACT OF 2010; Congressional Record Vol. 156, No. 173

congVote.result: So the motion was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: James Zadroga 9/11 Health and Compensation Act of 2010
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House concurred in the Senate amendment to H.R. 847, to amend the Public Health Service Act to extend and improve protections and services to individuals directly impacted by the terrorist attack in New York City on September 11, 2001, by a yea-and-nay vote of 206 yeas to 60 nays, Roll No. 664.
